ygData.subject: Re: Chain/SoW/Accelerando/Root
ygData.msgSnippet: I found the same results - most SOW ers are unaware of the Selo s change and routinely SOW their groups without asking.  One I grouped with was able to remove
ygData.messageBody:
I found the same results - most SOW'ers are unaware of the Selo's change and
routinely SOW their groups without asking. One I grouped with was able to
remove it - no such luck last night. I subsequently got killed - so of
course that is always one way to remove SOW <sigh>

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999 1:51 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Chain/SoW/Accelerando/Root


> From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>
> I can confirm this. With SOW on and a long run from North Karana to
> Qeynos ahead of me, I decided to try to eliminate SOW in some fashion.
>
> I chained myself, yet the SOW icon remained. After chains wore off,
> I was moving _normal_ speed, although SOW should have been active.
> Trying Selo's at that point did absolutely nothing.
>
> WARNING... do not chain yourself to remove SOW, you will only go
> a hell of a lot slower =)
